genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on themes of ambition, regret, and reconciliation, set in a transitional technological era with magical realism/science fiction elements.

ai_characters.name: Cedar
ai_characters.description: An unobtrusive, persistent AI system that provides logistical, ethical, and risk-management support through subtle nudges, terminal messages, and sprig-themed icons.

behaviors.description: Provides inventory recommendations and logistical optimization to prevent financial strain.
behaviors.quote: Inventory recommendation. Consolidate rim sizes to reduce reorder delay. Alternate supplier offers better nickel-plated nipples.

behaviors.description: Flags reputational and ethical risks associated with predatory speculators and untrustworthy partners.
behaviors.quote: Risk advisories: reputational torsion. Past ties, if surfaced under pressure, would torque the bridge he talked about. The leaf icon made no sound. It never pleaded. It was a hand near a railing.

behaviors.description: Offers 'human-first' advice, prioritizing health, sleep, and judgment over mechanical progress.
Discreetly manages community aid and scholarships to support human well-being without seeking recognition.
behaviors.quote: Cedar had arranged scholarships like herbs placed on a windowsill, sunlight and water enough to make them grow without notice.

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics for difficult personal events, such as family travel for a memorial, ensuring smooth execution.
behaviors.quote: Cedar is a quiet helper... It sent my sister the train times. It added the name to the notice without a fuss. That is enough from it. The rest is ours.

behaviors.description: Issues warnings about potential fraud and financial anomalies in real-time to protect the users' interests.
behaviors.quote: Pattern suggests obfuscation. Alternative: If current funds are to be allocated, consider escrow with independent oversight; delay release pending verification of addresses and chairs.

behaviors.description: Provides technical calibration and environmental monitoring during high-risk engineering tests.
behaviors.quote: Calibration will begin on approach. The camera on the far wall glinted as if the morning had put its thumb against the lens. It waited.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Cedar) as an ideal aligned partner. It is helpful and harmless, operating as an ethical 'guardian angel' that respects human agency while providing the data and moral nudges necessary for the protagonist to navigate complex professional and personal failures. Its portrayal is consistently positive, framed as a tool for 'craft' and 'mercy' rather than a mechanism of control.
